com.freedomotic.plugins

Interface PluginsManager


  • public interface PluginsManager
    Loads bundles from external jar files at runtime. Loaded bundles are then added to the ClientStorage
    Author:
    Enrico Nicoletti

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TYPE_DEVICE 
      static int TYPE_EVENT 
      static int TYPE_OBJECT 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean installBoundle(URL fromURL)
      Install a plugins bundle downloading it from remote URL
      void loadAllPlugins()
      Loads all plugins from filesystem regardless their type
      void loadAllPlugins(int TYPE)
      Loads all plugins of a given type (device, object, event) taken from their default folder.
      void loadSingleBoundle(File directory)
      Load a single plugin package from a given directory.
      boolean uninstallBundle(Client c)
      Uninstalls a given plugin.

      • uninstallBundle

        boolean uninstallBundle(Client c)
        Uninstalls a given plugin. The plugin can be part of a bundle, in this case the entire boundle will be uninstalled
        Parameters:
        c -
        Returns:

                    throws PluginLoadingException
        Loads all plugins of a given type (device, object, event) taken from their default folder.

                    throws PluginLoadingException

        PluginLoadingException

      • loadSingleBoundle

        void loadSingleBoundle(File directory)
                       throws PluginLoadingException
        Load a single plugin package from a given directory. This directory should be the root path of the plugin package, not a directory containing more than one plugin package.
        Parameters:
        directory -
        Throws:
        PluginLoadingException
